project_descr: Conservation, sustainable use of biodiversity, and maintenance of ecosystem services of internationally important protected wetlands

outputs.output_descr: The project objective is to improve management in order to increase the conservation, sustainable use, and maintenance of the ecosystem services of internationally important wetlands.
